job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Brewster, NY Full Time 05/07/21 Peckham Industries delivers the highest quality materials and custom solutions to thousands of road construction and road maintenance customers throughout New York and New England. We have several Hot Mix Asphalt and Concrete Plants, Quarries and Terminals, as well as, a paving and reclamation division all located throughout the NY and New England area.  Thank you for your Interest in Peckham Industries. Please complete the application in its entirety and if you have a resume and/or cover letter, please upload a copy before submitting. The position is part of a technology team that is responsible for development of software solutions that support Peckham's strategic objectives. Activities include analysis, design, coding, debugging, testing, and support of software applications. The software application functions cover a wide range of business functions ranging from customer-facing web interfaces to back-office and industrial IoT automation.   The ideal candidate is technologically versatile, team-oriented, but also able to work independently on moderately complex projects, sometimes with only general guidance. The position will provide challenge and the opportunity for continued career growth. This position has no supervisory responsibilities. This job operates in an office and professional environment. This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers. On occasion the job will require going out in the field, visiting production facilities. This is mostly sedentary outside of travel in an office space. This would require the ability to sit at a desk, frequent walking, bend or stand, as necessary. Designated days and schedule will be primarily Monday-Friday though will also be based on the needs of the operation and business, may require weekends, nights and early mornings. Position requires up to 5% travel by car to offices throughout Hudson Valley, Vermont and Massachusetts based on the needs of the operations and business.  Please note this job description is not designed to cover or contain a comprehensivelisting of activities, duties or responsibilities that are required of the employee for thisjob. Duties, responsibilities and activities may change at any time with or without notice. Required knowledge and skills would typically be obtained through a bachelor's degree in computer science or related field plus 6 to 10 years of full lifecycle software development experience.
